title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Advanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Using a Multimodal Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy using multimodal representations (visual, symbolic, interactive).
Learners can visualize and interactively explain abstract mathematical concepts using digital tools (smartphone apps, simulations).
Learners can analyze real-world case-based problems and propose creative solutions in PBL team projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
